verbs.description: West Virginia GOP Senate candidates Evan Jenkins and Pat Morrisey [V: have] each run highly mendacious ads against each other pointing to imaginary links with Hillary Clinton , supposedly showing their treachery toward Donald Trump .

[ARG0: West Virginia GOP Senate candidates Evan Jenkins and Pat Morrisey] have each run highly mendacious ads against each other pointing to imaginary links with Hillary Clinton , [ARGM-ADV: supposedly] [V: showing] [ARG1: their treachery toward Donald Trump] .
